snippet: The Republican candidate’s sweater vests have inspired their own Twitter feed and a Web site, FearRicksVest.com. There is also a music video, “Sleeves Slow Me Down,” on YouTube.
abstract: Republican candidate Rick Santorum’s sweater vests have inspired a Twitter feed and a Web site, as well as music video on YouTube.
lead_paragraph: The Republican candidate’s sweater vests have inspired their own Twitter feed and a Web site, FearRicksVest.com. There is also a music video, “Sleeves Slow Me Down,” on YouTube.

headline.seo: Sleeveless and V-Necked, Santorum’s Sweaters Are Turning Heads
